ttl.name: SIDE TURN SIGNAL LIGHT ASSEMBLY (for Front Fender)

item.ptxt: Use the same procedure for the RH and LH sides.
The procedure listed below is for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE SIDE TURN SIGNAL LIGHT ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Detach the 2 claws and remove the side turn signal light assembly LH as shown in the illustration.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE SIDE TURN SIGNAL LIGHT SOCKET AND WIRE

s2.ptxt: Turn the side turn signal light socket and wire in the direction indicated by the arrow and pull it to remove the side turn signal light socket and wire.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE SIDE TURN SIGNAL LIGHT BULB

s2.ptxt: Remove the side turn signal light bulb from the side turn signal light socket and wire.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE SIDE TURN SIGNAL LIGHT LENS GASKET LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the side turn signal light lens gasket LH.
